Title: Relates to contract cost adjustments in the middle of contract terms for school districts transportation contracts
Summary: Provides that contract cost adjustments in the middle of contract terms for school districts transportation contracts shall be at no additional cost to the state, locality or school district unless such amendment is necessary to comply with the statewide transition to zero-emission buses and provided that it has been established by the contractor that there has been at least an equivalent increase in the amount of such contractor's cost of operation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to contract cost adjustments in the middle of contract terms for school districts transportation contracts
